argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tngngp.t | |- T = ( G toNrmGrp N ) |
| 2 |  | tngngp.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tngngp.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | tngngp.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 5 |  | tngngpd.1 | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 6 |  | tngngpd.2 | |- ( ph -> N : X --> RR ) |
| 7 |  | tngngpd.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( N ` x ) = 0 <-> x = .0. ) ) |
| 8 |  | tngngpd.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( N ` ( x .- y ) ) <_ ( ( N ` x ) + ( N ` y ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_eqeltri | |- X e. _V |
| 11 |  | #P_reex | |- RR e. _V |
| 12 |  | #P_fex2 | |- ( ( N : X --> RR /\ X e. _V /\ RR e. _V ) -> N e. _V ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_mp3an23 | |- ( N : X --> RR -> N e. _V ) |
| 14 | 1, 3 | #P_tngds | |- ( N e. _V -> ( N o. .- ) = ( dist ` T ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 13, 14 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> ( N o. .- ) = ( dist ` T ) ) |
| 16 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_nrmmetd | |- ( ph -> ( N o. .- ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> ( dist ` T ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` T ) = ( dist ` T ) |
| 19 | 1, 2, 18 | #P_tngngp2 | |- ( N : X --> RR -> ( T e. NrmGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( dist ` T ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( T e. NrmGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( dist ` T ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 5, 17, 20 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ph -> T e. NrmGrp ) |
